analysis.key_quote: This proposal would strip these professionals out of their area of expertise and replace them with people who are unserious and unprofessional with loyalty to the office of the President to the detriment of the America people.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a professional civil service and the potential negative impact on expertise and loyalty to the Constitution, rather than to political figures. This aligns with concerns about politicization and the loss of institutional knowledge.
